content.data:
This option allows you to set the structure of your Composite Material. 
 A Composite Material is a sheet Material consisting of several layers 
 of sheet goods.

The Composite Material Manager is only available for the  Composite 
 Material  type.

Select your sheet good from the pane on the right and then click the 
 left button to add it to the list of Materials that make up the Composite 
 in the left pane. There is a Filter option at the top to assist in finding 
 a specific Material.

You can control the order the sheets are layered by using the Up and 
 Down buttons and remove a sheet from the Composite by clicking the Right 
 button.

The following fields can be edited once a sheet good is added to the 
 Composite:

Face Up -  Specifies if the sheet 
 good is Face Up (Enabled) or Face Down (Disabled).

Oversize -  An Oversize amount 
 for the sheet good when used in this Composite.

See the  Composite Material 
 Type  topic for more information.
